turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Greek Town riot.
turn.1: What happened in the Greek Town Riot?
turn.2: The mob, gathering more men along the way, thronged around the South Omaha Jail where the Greek prisoner was being held.
turn.4: The police decided it was unsafe to keep him there and decided to move their prisoner to the main Omaha jail.
turn.6: The mob followed the police wagon as it left the jail.
turn.7: Why did they follow the wagon?
turn.8: More than once they got their hands on the prisoner.
turn.9: What did they do with the prisoner?
turn.10: At one point they almost lynched him.
turn.11: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.12: After the wagon escaped their grasp, the agitated men turned back towards South Omaha.
